articles.title: Article 1 (Personal Information We Collect and How We Collect It)
content: The Company collects the following personal information to provide its services:
• Required Items: Email address, Nickname
• Collection Method:
- Directly entered by the user upon email sign-up
- Email and nickname information provided by Google upon Google sign-in

articles.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information)
content: The Company uses the collected personal information for the following purposes:
• Member identification and management
• Provision, maintenance, and improvement of services
• Delivery of service-related notices and handling of complaints

articles.title: Article 3 (Period of Retention and Use of Personal Information)
content: The user's personal information is destroyed without delay upon withdrawal from membership.
However, if retention is required by relevant laws, the information will be stored safely for the specified period.
• Records on contracts or withdrawal of offers: 5 years
• Records on consumer complaints or dispute resolution: 3 years

articles.title: Article 4 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
content: In principle, the Company does not provide users' personal information to external parties. However, the following cases are exceptions:
• When the user has given prior consent
• When required by law or unavoidable for submission upon request from investigative agencies

articles.title: Article 5 (Entrustment of Personal Information Processing)
content: The Company does not entrust the processing of personal information to external companies.
Should entrustment occur in the future, we will specify the trustee, the scope of work, and the entrustment period in this policy and obtain prior consent.

articles.title: Article 6 (User's Rights and How to Exercise Them)
content: Users may view or modify their personal information at any time and may withdraw their consent to the collection and use of personal information by withdrawing their membership.
Requests to view, correct, or delete personal information can be made through the settings menu within the service or via the contact information below.

articles.title: Article 7 (Procedure and Method of Destroying Personal Information)
content: • Destruction Procedure: When a user requests withdrawal or the purpose of collecting and using personal information has been achieved, the information is destroyed without delay.
• Destruction Method:
- Electronic files: Permanently deleted using a technical method that makes recovery impossible.
- Paper documents: Shredded or incinerated.

articles.title: Article 8 (Chief Privacy Officer)
content: The Company designates a Chief Privacy Officer as follows to protect users' personal information and handle related complaints.
• Name: Lee Min-hyuk
• Contact: repeat2487@gmail.com

articles.title: Article 9 (Changes to the Privacy Policy)
content: This Privacy Policy may be amended according to laws or company policies, and any changes will be announced in advance through service notices.
